## RuleBuilder class

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Fluent builder for creating policy rules.

Rules match changes based on descriptor dimensions. All conditions are combined with AND logic - a change must match all specified conditions for the rule to apply.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RuleBuilder 
```
